history.proof: intros xs. induction xs as [|x xs' IHxs]. - apply op_equiv_nil. - apply op_equiv_cons. apply IHxs.

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
K: Type
K_eq_dec: forall x y : K, {x = y} + {x <> y}

Goal:
forall xs : list op, op_equivalent xs xs

Premises:
Inductive op_equivalent : list op -> list op -> Prop := op_equiv_nil : op_equivalent [] [] | op_equiv_cons : forall (x : op) (xs ys : list op), op_equivalent xs ys -> op_equivalent (x :: xs) (x :: ys) | op_equiv_move : forall (x y : op) (xs ys : list op), good_op_move x y -> op_equivalent xs ys -> op_equivalent (x :: y :: xs) (y :: x :: ys) | op_equiv_trans : forall l1 l2 l3 : list op, op_equivalent l1 l2 -> op_equivalent l2 l3 -> op_equivalent l1 l3 Arguments op_equivalent (_ _)%list_scope Arguments op_equiv_cons _ (_ _)%list_scope Arguments op_equiv_move _ _ (_ _)%list_scope Arguments op_equiv_trans (_ _ _)%list_scope
Inductive op : Type := I : K -> op | O : K -> op
Inductive list (A : Type) : Type := nil : list A | cons : A -> list A -> list A Arguments list _%type_scope Arguments nil {A}%type_scope Arguments cons {A}%type_scope a l%list_scope : rename
op_equiv_ack_op_rl : forall xs ys : list op, op_equivalent xs ys -> forall k : K, acknowledged_op k ys -> acknowledged_op k xs
op_equiv_ack_op_lr : forall xs ys : list op, op_equivalent xs ys -> forall k : K, acknowledged_op k xs -> acknowledged_op k ys
op_equiv_Permutation : forall xs ys : list op, op_equivalent xs ys -> Permutation xs ys
op_equiv_AAOF_IR_equiv : forall xs ys : list op, op_equivalent xs ys -> forall l : list IR, IR_equivalent (acknowledge_all_ops_func xs l) (acknowledge_all_ops_func ys l)
dedup_NoDup_id : forall (A : Type) (A_eq_dec : forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) (xs : list A), NoDup xs -> dedup A_eq_dec xs = xs
remove_not_in : forall (A : Type) (A_eq_dec : forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) (x : A) (xs : list A), ~ In x xs -> remove A_eq_dec x xs = xs
subset_length : forall A : Type, (forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) -> forall xs ys : list A, NoDup xs -> (forall x : A, In x xs -> In x ys) -> length ys >= length xs
remove_length_in : forall (A : Type) (A_eq_dec : forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) (x : A) (xs : list A), In x xs -> NoDup xs -> S (length (remove A_eq_dec x xs)) = length xs
remove_all_app_r : forall (A : Type) (A_eq_dec : forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) (xs ys zs : list A), remove_all A_eq_dec xs (ys ++ zs) = remove_all A_eq_dec xs ys ++ remove_all A_eq_dec xs zs
remove_length_not_in : forall (A : Type) (A_eq_dec : forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) (x : A) (xs : list A), ~ In x xs -> length (remove A_eq_dec x xs) = length xs
dedup_not_in_cons : forall (A : Type) (A_eq_dec : forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) (x : A) (xs : list A), ~ In x xs -> x :: dedup A_eq_dec xs = dedup A_eq_dec (x :: xs)
remove_length_ge : forall (A : Type) (A_eq_dec : forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) (x : A) (xs : list A), NoDup xs -> length (remove A_eq_dec x xs) >= length xs - 1
op_equivalent_sind : forall P : list op -> list op -> SProp, P [] [] -> (forall (x : op) (xs ys : list op), op_equivalent xs ys -> P xs ys -> P (x :: xs) (x :: ys)) -> (forall (x y : op) (xs ys : list op), good_op_move x y -> op_equivalent xs ys -> P xs ys -> P (x :: y :: xs) (y :: x :: ys)) -> (forall l1 l2 l3 : list op, op_equivalent l1 l2 -> P l1 l2 -> op_equivalent l2 l3 -> P l2 l3 -> P l1 l3) -> forall l l0 : list op, op_equivalent l l0 -> P l l0
op_equivalent_ind : forall P : list op -> list op -> Prop, P [] [] -> (forall (x : op) (xs ys : list op), op_equivalent xs ys -> P xs ys -> P (x :: xs) (x :: ys)) -> (forall (x y : op) (xs ys : list op), good_op_move x y -> op_equivalent xs ys -> P xs ys -> P (x :: y :: xs) (y :: x :: ys)) -> (forall l1 l2 l3 : list op, op_equivalent l1 l2 -> P l1 l2 -> op_equivalent l2 l3 -> P l2 l3 -> P l1 l3) -> forall l l0 : list op, op_equivalent l l0 -> P l l0
subseq_remove : forall (A : Type) (A_eq_dec : forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) (x : A) (xs : list A), subseq (remove A_eq_dec x xs) xs
dedup_app : forall (A : Type) (A_eq_dec : forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) (xs ys : list A), (forall x y : A, In x xs -> In y ys -> x <> y) -> dedup A_eq_dec (xs ++ ys) = dedup A_eq_dec xs ++ dedup A_eq_dec ys
in_dedup_was_in : forall (A : Type) (A_eq_dec : forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) (xs : list A) (x : A), In x (dedup A_eq_dec xs) -> In x xs
remove_NoDup : forall (A : Type) (A_eq_dec : forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) (x : A) (xs : list A), NoDup xs -> NoDup (remove A_eq_dec x xs)
remove_length_lt : forall (A : Type) (x : A) (xs : list A) (eq_dec : forall x0 y : A, {x0 = y} + {x0 <> y}), In x xs -> length xs > length (remove eq_dec x xs)
Inductive op_equivalent : list op -> list op -> Prop := op_equiv_nil : op_equivalent [] [] | op_equiv_cons : forall (x : op) (xs ys : list op), op_equivalent xs ys -> op_equivalent (x :: xs) (x :: ys) | op_equiv_move : forall (x y : op) (xs ys : list op), good_op_move x y -> op_equivalent xs ys -> op_equivalent (x :: y :: xs) (y :: x :: ys) | op_equiv_trans : forall l1 l2 l3 : list op, op_equivalent l1 l2 -> op_equivalent l2 l3 -> op_equivalent l1 l3 Arguments op_equivalent (_ _)%list_scope Arguments op_equiv_cons _ (_ _)%list_scope Arguments op_equiv_move _ _ (_ _)%list_scope Arguments op_equiv_trans (_ _ _)%list_scope
in_remove : forall (A : Type) (A_eq_dec : forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) (x y : A) (xs : list A), In y (remove A_eq_dec x xs) -> In y xs
remove_preserve : forall (A : Type) (A_eq_dec : forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) (x y : A) (xs : list A), x <> y -> In y xs -> In y (remove A_eq_dec x xs)
op_equiv_cons : forall (x : op) (xs ys : list op), op_equivalent xs ys -> op_equivalent (x :: xs) (x :: ys)
op_equiv_move : forall (x y : op) (xs ys : list op), good_op_move x y -> op_equivalent xs ys -> op_equivalent (x :: y :: xs) (y :: x :: ys)
remove_app_comm : forall (A : Type) (A_eq_dec : forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) (a : A) (xs ys : list A), remove A_eq_dec a (xs ++ ys) = remove A_eq_dec a xs ++ remove A_eq_dec a ys
op_eq_dec : forall x y : op, {x = y} + {x <> y}
IR_equiv_AAOF_I : forall (k : K) (xs ys : list op) (target : list IR), op_equivalent xs ys -> IR_equivalent (acknowledge_all_ops_func xs target) (acknowledge_all_ops_func ys target) -> IR_equivalent (acknowledge_all_ops_func (I k :: xs) target) (acknowledge_all_ops_func (I k :: ys) target)
acknowledged_op_defn : forall (k : K) (xs : list op), acknowledged_op k xs -> In (O k) xs
map2snd : ?B -> list ?A -> list (?A * ?B) where ?A : [K : Type K_eq_dec : forall x y : K, {x = y} + {x <> y} |- Type] ?B : [K : Type K_eq_dec : forall x y : K, {x = y} + {x <> y} |- Type]
filterMap : (?A -> option ?B) -> list ?A -> list ?B where ?A : [K : Type K_eq_dec : forall x y : K, {x = y} + {x <> y} |- Type] ?B : [K : Type K_eq_dec : forall x y : K, {x = y} + {x <> y} |- Type]
filter_rel : (forall x y : ?A, {?rel x y} + {~ ?rel x y}) -> ?A -> list ?A -> list ?A where ?A : [K : Type K_eq_dec : forall x y : K, {x = y} + {x <> y} |- Type] ?rel : [K : Type K_eq_dec : forall x y : K, {x = y} + {x <> y} |- Relation_Definitions.relation ?A]
collate_ls : (forall x y : ?A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) -> list ?A -> (?A -> ?A -> list ?B) -> ?A -> ?B -> ?A -> ?A -> list ?B where ?A : [K : Type K_eq_dec : forall x y : K, {x = y} + {x <> y} |- Type] ?B : [K : Type K_eq_dec : forall x y : K, {x = y} + {x <> y} |- Type]
collate : (forall x y : ?A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) -> ?A -> (?A -> ?A -> list ?B) -> list (?A * ?B) -> ?A -> ?A -> list ?B where ?A : [K : Type K_eq_dec : forall x y : K, {x = y} + {x <> y} |- Type] ?B : [K : Type K_eq_dec : forall x y : K, {x = y} + {x <> y} |- Type]
a_equiv : (forall k k' : ?K, {k = k'} + {k <> k'}) -> list (?K * ?V) -> list (?K * ?V) -> Prop where ?K : [K : Type K_eq_dec : forall x y : K, {x = y} + {x <> y} |- Type] ?V : [K : Type K_eq_dec : forall x y : K, {x = y} + {x <> y} |- Type]
IR_equiv_AAOF_II_neq : forall (xs ys : list op) (target : list IR) (k k' : K), k <> k' -> op_equivalent xs ys -> IR_equivalent (acknowledge_all_ops_func xs target) (acknowledge_all_ops_func ys target) -> IR_equivalent (acknowledge_all_ops_func (I k :: I k' :: xs) target) (acknowledge_all_ops_func (I k' :: I k :: ys) target)
subseq : list ?A -> list ?A -> Prop where ?A : [K : Type K_eq_dec : forall x y : K, {x = y} + {x <> y} |- Type]
op_equiv_trans : forall l1 l2 l3 : list op, op_equivalent l1 l2 -> op_equivalent l2 l3 -> op_equivalent l1 l3
update2 : (forall x y : ?A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) -> (?A -> ?A -> ?B) -> ?A -> ?A -> ?B -> ?A -> ?A -> ?B where ?A : [K : Type K_eq_dec : forall x y : K, {x = y} + {x <> y} |- Type] ?B : [K : Type K_eq_dec : forall x y : K, {x = y} + {x <> y} |- Type]
before : ?A -> ?A -> list ?A -> Prop where ?A : [K : Type K_eq_dec : forall x y : K, {x = y} + {x <> y} |- Type]
input : Type where ?BaseParams : [K : Type K_eq_dec : forall x y : K, {x = y} + {x <> y} |- BaseParams]

``` 
intros xs. 
induction xs as [|x xs' IHxs].
- apply op_equiv_nil.
- apply op_equiv_cons. 
  + apply IHxs.
